p:
The Attenuated Total Reflection Fourier-Transform Infrared (ATR-FTIR) spectra for all the samples were recorded to better elucidate the changes in the chemical composition of the essential oil during the heating treatment (Fig. 3). There was identified an intense band at 812 cm −1, and other bands at 867 cm −1, 994 cm −1, 1116 cm −1 1174 cm −1, 1459 cm −1, 1422 cm −1, 1302 cm −1, 1253 cm −1, and 3200–3600 cm −1 from carvacrol
25 .
